content.rendered:
With time-saving updates like saved reports launched and transformative updates like scheduled reports on the horizon, we want to bring our partners together to talk about how Handshake can make your end-of-year reporting a breeze.

Followup Resources

  • Scheduled Reports Beta: If you’re interested in participating in the beta launch of scheduled reports, fill out this form. We’ll send you an email in early December when the feature has been turned on in your account.
  • Handshake Academy: For those looking on a more advanced training on Handshake reporting, check out our Handshake Academy course here.
  • Documentation: Read more about our 2020 reporting updates here

excerpt.rendered: An overview of recent and upcoming reporting updates in Handshake
